statements: SELECT * FROM InsuranceQuotes WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT insurance_type, quote_amount FROM InsuranceQuotes WHERE quote_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, insurance_type, quote_date FROM InsuranceQuotes WHERE insurance_type = 'Car';
SELECT quote_id, customer_id, insurance_type, quote_amount, quote_date FROM InsuranceQuotes ORDER BY quote_amount DESC;
SELECT MAX(quote_amount) AS max_quote_amount FROM InsuranceQuotes;
SELECT * FROM InsuranceQuotes WHERE quote_amount > 1000 ORDER BY quote_date DESC;
SELECT quote_id, customer_id, insurance_type FROM InsuranceQuotes WHERE customer_id = 123456 ORDER BY insurance_type ASC, quote_amount DESC;
SELECT insurance_type, MAX(quote_amount) AS max_quote_amount FROM InsuranceQuotes GROUP BY insurance_type;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(quote_id) AS quote_count FROM InsuranceQuotes GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(quote_id) >= 3;
SELECT DISTINCT insurance_type FROM InsuranceQuotes WHERE quote_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM insurance_quotes;
SELECT customer_name, quote_amount FROM insurance_quotes WHERE insurance_type='Life';
SELECT quote_id, customer_name, insurance_type, quote_amount FROM insurance_quotes ORDER BY quote_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, quote_amount FROM insurance_quotes WHERE quote_amount > 5000 ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, insurance_type, quote_amount FROM insurance_quotes WHERE quote_amount < 3000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_quotes WHERE quote_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_name, insurance_type, quote_amount FROM insurance_quotes WHERE quote_amount < 500
SELECT insurance_type, customer_name FROM insurance_quotes WHERE quote_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY insurance_type ASC, customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM insurance_quotes WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' OR insurance_type = 'Auto'
SELECT quote_id, insurance_type, AVG(quote_amount) AS average_amount FROM insurance_quotes GROUP BY quote_id, insurance_type HAVING AVG(quote_amount) > 750 ORDER BY quote_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Quotes;
SELECT customer_id, insurance_provider, quote_amount FROM Quotes WHERE insurance_type='Car';
SELECT customer_id, insurance_provider, quote_amount FROM Quotes WHERE quote_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, insurance_type, insurance_provider FROM Quotes WHERE insurance_provider='ABC Insurance' ORDER BY quote_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, insurance_provider, quote_amount FROM Quotes WHERE insurance_type='Home' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Quotes WHERE quote_amount > 1000 ORDER BY quote_amount DESC, insurance_type ASC;
SELECT customer_id, insurance_provider FROM Quotes WHERE insurance_type = 'Life Insurance' GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT provider_name, rating, website FROM InsuranceProviders ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Quotes q JOIN InsuranceProviders i ON q.insurance_provider = i.provider_name WHERE i.rating > 4 ORDER BY q.quote_amount ASC, i.rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Quotes;
SELECT quote_id, coverage_amount, insurance_company FROM Quotes WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM InsuranceCompanies WHERE company_id = 3;
SELECT coverage_type, description FROM CoverageTypes WHERE coverage_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM Quotes WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT quote_id, coverage_amount FROM Quotes WHERE quote_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT name, age, email FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT company_name, website_url FROM InsuranceCompanies WHERE headquarters_location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT coverage_type, description FROM CoverageTypes WHERE coverage_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY coverage_id;
SELECT * FROM InsuranceQuotes;
SELECT quote_id, amount, issue_date FROM InsuranceQuotes WHERE insurance_type = 'Car';
SELECT customer_name, age, email FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM InsuranceCompanies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT policy_id, coverage_amount, premium_amount FROM Policies WHERE insurance_type = 'Health' ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM InsuranceQuotes WHERE insurance_type = 'Car' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, email FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 AND phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT company_name, location FROM InsuranceCompanies WHERE website IS NOT NULL ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE coverage_amount >= 10000 AND premium_amount <= 500;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 AND claim_reason LIKE '%accident%';
